products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
products.description: White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space. products.title: Meadow Lark Natural Roller Blind
products.description: Light and bright, the meadow lark roller blind is ideal for enhancing a minimalist interior. The grey and white hues of the fabric are simple and versatile and will look sleek and clean at your windows, whilst the pretty wildflower design adds a touch of traditional charm. As well as looking great, this window blind also boasts pollen and dust mite reducing qualities. The fabric is pollergen treated and can be raised and lowered with ease thanks to the electric remote control, making this blind such a convenient update to any family space.
